data.title: Charles Brooks
data.meta_description: The staff at QU is always here to help. Learn more about Charles Marcine Brooks, our Professor of Marketing, Chair of Marketing.
data.text:
Your Tools for Success

At Quinnipiac, we provide the knowledge and resources you need to make a tangible impact on your chosen field. Through a combination of classroom theory and practical experience designed for you to succeed, you'll experience the life-changing opportunity of working and learning in the community and around the globe.

Rankings and Distinctions

Plan a visit

Join us for a campus tour, or attend one of our Open Houses. Speak with an admissions counselor as well as current students — and experience what makes Quinnipiac so special.

See Quinnipiac for yourself

Paying for QU

Choosing to pursue a degree is an investment in your future. We're here to help you find the support and resources to understand your options and make a plan for success.

A Community to Thrive In

Every part of the student experience is designed with your success in mind. Explore all that we have to offer and discover how we can shape our shared community together.

Quinnipiac Today

Launching the University of the Future

Quinnipiac is a private, coeducational university where students engage in an educational experience that’s both personal and challenging with faculty who care deeply about student outcomes. We offer a diverse range of programs and courses, including our industry-leading dual-degree programs, to approximately 6,000 undergraduate and 2,700 graduate, law and medical students.

Make a Positive Impact

A Quinnipiac education prepares students for 21st-Century, global careers. Through experiences such as an archaeological dig in Hungary, working in a Congressional press office in Washington, D.C., leading a fundraising effort as part of a student group or interning at Nickelodeon in LA, students are personally and professionally transformed. Your support can ensure that students and professors continue to benefit from the types of experiences that define Quinnipiac.
